job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: heres onemap team is looking for a data scientist that will helping with the creation of mapping products that are highly available performant and near realtime and edge computing on vehicle we drive continuous rearchitecture improving service latency accuracy of content service robustness and costofownership relentlessly eliminating undifferentiated work services content domains and products both new and old in favor of single sourced and open building blocks as owners of heres frontline systems for both ingestion and delivery to automotive customers we lead innovation in both reuse automation of operations and next evolution of productsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtwho are youltbrgtltbrgt years of professional experience all levels including graduate studentltbrgtpython or cltbrgtobject detection trackingltbrgthandson experience with designing and training deep learning models cnn rnn lstm pointnet etc on largescale datasets in a distributed environmentltbrgtnice to have experience with applying deep learning techniques to sensor fusion d object detection tracking or predicting the future behavior of agentsltbrgtautonomous drivingltbrgtltbrgt
